page.title: 16Four Oaks - Life Styles
page.content: The most obvious signs of pop culture and its influence on fashion and social attitudes are to be found among the younger people.The pressure of advertising on this impressionable group is so relentless that few remain unaffected.Even so,it is relatively seldom that examples of the most extreme and "shocking"aspects of this development are seen.Interest in fashion and social activity has quite a high priority.Eating out is much enjoyed and this is reflected in the number of restaurants that are to be found in the locality.These range in style from the sophisticated special restaurants,to the steak bars and public house restaurants.The only positive sign of gambling activity is the local betting shop,although no doubt much takes place in the home in the form of football pools,etc.
